pr_title: feature: support hsf on TCC transaction mode

timeline.bodyText: I think  !SpringProxyUtils.isProxy Contains the !(bean instanceof SpringProxy)) condition.
timeline.author: slievrly

replies.bodyText: !SpringProxyUtils.isProxy(bean) -> !AopUtils.isAopProxy(bean)  -> !((object instanceof SpringProxy && (Proxy.isProxyClass(object.getClass()) || ClassUtils.isCglibProxyClass(object.getClass())))) -> !(bean instanceof SpringProxy)) || !((Proxy.isProxyClass(object.getClass()) || ClassUtils.isCglibProxyClass(object.getClass()))))) ->   !(bean instanceof SpringProxy)) || (!Proxy.isProxyClass(object.getClass()) && !ClassUtils.isCglibProxyClass(object.getClass())))
replies.author: slievrly
